zone.line: of the most celebrated writers of the present
day without be without being startled
with the electric life which burns within
their words. They measure the circumference
-rence & sound the depths of human
nature with a comprehensive & all-penetrating
X hieraphants
-trating spirit. : Poets are the priests
of an unapprehended inspiration, the
mirrors of the gigantic shadows which
futurity casts upon the present, the
words which express what they understand
-stand not, the trumpets which sing
to battle & feel not what they
inspire: the influence which is moved
not but moves. Poets are the unacknowledged
-knowledged legislators of the world.
Insert
X And they are themselves perhaps the most sincerely
astonished at its manifestations, for it is less thier
own spirit than the spirit of the age.
